lines: SDAH:612
1. Tshivhidzo tsha Yesu mafumo ngeya,
Ri ye-vho nndwani, ri lwe na swina,
Nduna ya mmbi, ndi Ene Yesu vho;
Ndi Muvhusa vhothe, U da na gundo.
I yani-ha phanda,
Inwi maswole,
Murena Asuyu,
A ri lwelaho.
2. Vhonani vhahashu, Mbilu ya muvhi,
I a tetemela, i ofha Yesu,
Ipfi lo ambiwa, ndi la u kunda;
Kha ri khwathe rothe, imbani nothe.
3. Ri tshimbile sa ’mbi, inwi vha Yesu,
Kha ri vha edzise vho no kundaho,
Ri si balangane, khosi ndi ’thihi.
Lutendo luthihi lu re kha Yesu.
4. Mahosi a shango, a lovha othe,
Tshivhidzo tsha Yesu tshone a tshi wi,
Tshi do di mu kunda, Ene sathane;
Kristo E na rine, ri do ofhani?
5. I da ri tangane, ri vhe vhathihi,
Sa tshivhidzo tshawe, ri imbe rothe,
Ri khode Murena maduvha othe,
Na vharunwa vhothe ri imbe rothe.
